Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.w3c.dom.Model

  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Model Handles all the data from an XML-file.

        Parameters:
        filename - the filename
        index - the index
        selectedTime - the selected time
        Returns:
